AddShardingNode.title: AddShardingNode
AddShardingNode.summary: Adds one or more data shards to a Tair cluster instance.

AllocateDirectConnection.title: AllocateDirectConnection
AllocateDirectConnection.summary: Applies for a private endpoint for a Tair (Redis OSS-compatible) instance.

AllocateInstancePublicConnection.title: AllocateInstancePublicConnection
AllocateInstancePublicConnection.summary: Applies for a public endpoint for a Tair (Redis OSS-compatible) instance.

CancelActiveOperationTasks.title: CancelActiveOperationTasks
CancelActiveOperationTasks.summary: Cancels O\\\&M events at a time.

CheckCloudResourceAuthorized.title: CheckCloudResourceAuthorized
CheckCloudResourceAuthorized.summary: Queries whether a Tair (Redis OSS-compatible) instance has the permissions to use Key Management Service (KMS).

CreateAccount.title: CreateAccount
CreateAccount.summary: Creates an account that has specific permissions for a Tair (Redis OSS-compatible) instance.

CreateBackup.title: CreateBackup
CreateBackup.summary: Backs up a Tair (Redis OSS-compatible) instance.

CreateGlobalDistributeCache.title: CreateGlobalDistributeCache
CreateGlobalDistributeCache.summary: Converts an existing Tair DRAM-based classic instance to the first child instance of a distributed instance.

CreateGlobalSecurityIPGroup.title: CreateGlobalSecurityIPGroup
CreateGlobalSecurityIPGroup.summary: Creates a global IP whitelist template.

CreateInstance.title: CreateInstance
CreateInstance.summary: Creates a Tair (Redis OSS-compatible) instance. If you want to create a Tair (Enterprise Edition) cloud-native instance, you can call the CreateTairInstance operation.

CreateInstances.title: CreateInstances
CreateInstances.summary: Creates multiple Tair (Redis OSS-compatible) instances at a time.

CreateTairInstance.title: CreateTairInstance
CreateTairInstance.summary: Creates a Tair (Enterprise Edition) cloud-native instance.

DeleteAccount.title: DeleteAccount
DeleteAccount.summary: Deletes an account from a Tair (Redis OSS-compatible) instance.

DeleteBackup.title: DeleteBackup
DeleteBackup.summary: Deletes a specified backup set. However, you can delete only backup sets that are manually backed up.

DeleteGlobalSecurityIPGroup.title: DeleteGlobalSecurityIPGroup
DeleteGlobalSecurityIPGroup.summary: Deletes a global IP whitelist template.

DeleteShardingNode.title: DeleteShardingNode
DeleteShardingNode.summary: Removes one or more data shards from a Tair (Redis OSS-compatible) cluster instance.

DescribeAccounts.title: DescribeAccounts
DescribeAccounts.summary: Queries a specified account of a Tair (Redis OSS-compatible) instance.

DescribeActiveOperationMaintenanceConfig.title: DescribeActiveOperationMaintenanceConfig
DescribeActiveOperationMaintenanceConfig.summary: Queries the O\\\&M task configurations of an instance.

DescribeActiveOperationTask.title: DescribeActiveOperationTask
DescribeActiveOperationTask.summary: Queries the details of the O\\\&M tasks of a Tair (Redis OSS-compatible) instance.

DescribeActiveOperationTaskCount.title: DescribeActiveOperationTaskCount
DescribeActiveOperationTaskCount.summary: Queries the number of O\\\&M tasks on a Tair (Redis OSS-compatible) instance.

DescribeActiveOperationTasks.title: DescribeActiveOperationTasks
DescribeActiveOperationTasks.summary: Queries the O\\\\\\\\\\&M event details of an instance.

DescribeAuditLogConfig.title: DescribeAuditLogConfig
DescribeAuditLogConfig.summary: Queries the audit log configurations of a Tair (Redis OSS-compatible) instance. The configurations include whether the audit log feature is enabled and the retention period of audit logs.

DescribeAuditRecords.title: DescribeAuditRecords
DescribeAuditRecords.summary: Queries the audit logs of a Tair (Redis OSS-compatible) instance.

DescribeAvailableResource.title: DescribeAvailableResource
DescribeAvailableResource.summary: Queries the types of Tair (Redis OSS-compatible) instances that can be created in a specified zone.

DescribeBackupPolicy.title: DescribeBackupPolicy
DescribeBackupPolicy.summary: Queries the backup policy of a Tair (Redis OSS-compatible) instance, including the backup cycle and backup time.

DescribeBackupTasks.title: DescribeBackupTasks
DescribeBackupTasks.summary: Queries the execution status of backup tasks for a Tair (Redis OSS-compatible) instance.

DescribeBackups.title: DescribeBackups
DescribeBackups.summary: Queries the backup files of the Tair (Redis OSS-compatible) instance.

DescribeCacheAnalysisReport.title: DescribeCacheAnalysisReport
DescribeCacheAnalysisReport.summary: Queries the cache analysis report of an instance on a specified date.

DescribeCacheAnalysisReportList.title: DescribeCacheAnalysisReportList
DescribeCacheAnalysisReportList.summary: Queries a list of cache analysis reports for an instance.

DescribeClusterBackupList.title: DescribeClusterBackupList
DescribeClusterBackupList.summary: Queries the backup sets of a Tair (Redis OSS-compatible) cluster instance.

DescribeClusterMemberInfo.title: DescribeClusterMemberInfo
DescribeClusterMemberInfo.summary: Queries the configuration information of nodes in a Tair (Redis OSS-compatible) cluster instance, such as the specifications and the maximum number of connections.

DescribeDBInstanceMonitor.title: DescribeDBInstanceMonitor
DescribeDBInstanceMonitor.summary: Queries the collection frequency of monitoring data for a Tair (Redis OSS-compatible) instance.

DescribeDBInstanceNetInfo.title: DescribeDBInstanceNetInfo
DescribeDBInstanceNetInfo.summary: Queries the network information of a Tair (Redis OSS-compatible) instance.

DescribeDBNodeDirectVipInfo.title: DescribeDBNodeDirectVipInfo
DescribeDBNodeDirectVipInfo.summary: Queries the information about virtual IP addresses (VIPs) of child instances of a cluster instance in direct connection mode.

DescribeDbInstanceConnectivity.title: DescribeDbInstanceConnectivity
DescribeDbInstanceConnectivity.summary: Checks the connectivity between the client IP address and the instance.

DescribeDedicatedClusterInstanceList.title: DescribeDedicatedClusterInstanceList
DescribeDedicatedClusterInstanceList.summary: Queries the information of Tair (Redis OSS-compatible) instances deployed in a dedicated cluster.

DescribeEncryptionKey.title: DescribeEncryptionKey
DescribeEncryptionKey.summary: Queries the details of a custom key for a Tair (Redis OSS-compatible) instance to use transparent data encryption (TDE).

DescribeEncryptionKeyList.title: DescribeEncryptionKeyList
DescribeEncryptionKeyList.summary: Queries a list of custom keys used by Tair (Redis OSS-compatible) instances.

DescribeEngineVersion.title: DescribeEngineVersion
DescribeEngineVersion.summary: Queries the major version and minor version of a Tair (Redis OSS-compatible) instance and the release notes for minor versions.

DescribeGlobalDistributeCache.title: DescribeGlobalDistributeCache
DescribeGlobalDistributeCache.summary: Queries the details of a distributed Tair (Redis OSS-compatible) instance.

DescribeGlobalSecurityIPGroupRelation.title: DescribeGlobalSecurityIPGroupRelation
DescribeGlobalSecurityIPGroupRelation.summary: Queries information about the global IP whitelist templates associated with an instance.

DescribeHistoryEventsStat.title: DescribeHistoryEventsStat
DescribeHistoryEventsStat.summary: Queries the statistics of historical events.

DescribeHistoryMonitorValues.title: DescribeHistoryMonitorValues
DescribeHistoryMonitorValues.summary: Queries the performance monitoring data of a Tair (Redis OSS-compatible) instance.

DescribeHistoryTasks.title: DescribeHistoryTasks
DescribeHistoryTasks.summary: Queries a list of tasks in the task center.

DescribeHistoryTasksStat.title: DescribeHistoryTasksStat
DescribeHistoryTasksStat.summary: Queries the task statistics in the task center.

DescribeInstanceAttribute.title: DescribeInstanceAttribute
DescribeInstanceAttribute.summary: Queries the attribute of Tair (Redis OSS-compatible) instances.

DescribeInstanceAutoRenewalAttribute.title: DescribeInstanceAutoRenewalAttribute
DescribeInstanceAutoRenewalAttribute.summary: Queries whether auto-renewal is enabled for a Tair (Redis OSS-compatible) instance.

DescribeInstanceConfig.title: DescribeInstanceConfig
DescribeInstanceConfig.summary: Queries the default parameter configurations of a Tair (Redis OSS-compatible) instance.

DescribeInstanceSSL.title: DescribeInstanceSSL
DescribeInstanceSSL.summary: Queries whether TLS (SSL) encryption is enabled for a Tair (Redis OSS-compatible) instance.

DescribeInstanceTDEStatus.title: DescribeInstanceTDEStatus
DescribeInstanceTDEStatus.summary: Queries whether transparent data encryption (TDE) is enabled for a Tair (Redis OSS-compatible) instance.

DescribeInstances.title: DescribeInstances
DescribeInstances.summary: Queries the information about one or more Tair (Redis OSS-compatible) instances.

DescribeInstancesOverview.title: DescribeInstancesOverview
DescribeInstancesOverview.summary: Queries the overview information of one or more Tair (Redis OSS-compatible) instances.

DescribeIntranetAttribute.title: DescribeIntranetAttribute
DescribeIntranetAttribute.summary: Queries the current bandwidth of a Tair (Redis OSS-compatible) instance.

DescribeLogicInstanceTopology.title: DescribeLogicInstanceTopology
DescribeLogicInstanceTopology.summary: Queries the logical topology of a Tair (Redis OSS-compatible) instance.

DescribeMonitorItems.title: DescribeMonitorItems
DescribeMonitorItems.summary: Queries the metrics of a Tair (Redis OSS-compatible) instance.

DescribeParameterGroup.title: DescribeParameterGroup
DescribeParameterGroup.summary: Queries the basic information about a parameter template.

DescribeParameterGroupSupportParam.title: DescribeParameterGroupSupportParam
DescribeParameterGroupSupportParam.summary: Queries the parameters that can be configured in parameter templates across different database versions.

DescribeParameterGroupTemplateList.title: DescribeParameterGroupTemplateList
DescribeParameterGroupTemplateList.summary: Queries the information about the parameters that can be configured in a parameter template, such as the default values, value ranges, and descriptions.

DescribeParameterGroups.title: DescribeParameterGroups
DescribeParameterGroups.summary: Queries a list of available parameter templates.

DescribeParameterModificationHistory.title: DescribeParameterModificationHistory
DescribeParameterModificationHistory.summary: Queries the parameter modification history of a Tair (Redis OSS-compatible) instance.

DescribeParameterTemplates.title: DescribeParameterTemplates
DescribeParameterTemplates.summary: Queries the parameters and their default values that are supported by Tair (Redis OSS-compatible) instances of different architectures and major versions.

DescribeParameters.title: DescribeParameters
DescribeParameters.summary: Queries the configuration parameters and running parameters of a Tair (Redis OSS-compatible) instance.

DescribePrice.title: DescribePrice
DescribePrice.summary: Queries the fees that you must pay when you create, upgrade, or renew a Tair (Redis OSS-compatible) instance.

DescribeRegions.title: DescribeRegions
DescribeRegions.summary: Queries all regions and zones supported for a Tair (Redis OSS-compatible) instance.

DescribeRoleZoneInfo.title: DescribeRoleZoneInfo
DescribeRoleZoneInfo.summary: Queries the role, type, minor version, and zone of each node in a Tair (Redis OSS-compatible) instance.

DescribeRunningLogRecords.title: DescribeRunningLogRecords
DescribeRunningLogRecords.summary: Queries the operational logs of a Tair (Redis OSS-compatible) instance.

DescribeSecurityGroupConfiguration.title: DescribeSecurityGroupConfiguration
DescribeSecurityGroupConfiguration.summary: Queries the security groups that are added to the whitelists of a Tair (Redis OSS-compatible) instance.

DescribeSecurityIps.title: DescribeSecurityIps
DescribeSecurityIps.summary: Queries the IP address whitelists of a Tair (Redis OSS-compatible) instance.

DescribeServiceLinkedRoleExists.title: DescribeServiceLinkedRoleExists
DescribeServiceLinkedRoleExists.summary: Queries whether the related service-linked role is created for Tair (Redis OSS-compatible) in the current account.

DescribeSlowLogRecords.title: DescribeSlowLogRecords
DescribeSlowLogRecords.summary: Queries the slow query logs of a Tair (Redis OSS-compatible) instance that are generated within a specified period of time.

DescribeTags.title: DescribeTags
DescribeTags.summary: Queries all tags in a region.

DescribeTairKVCacheInferInstances.title: DescribeTairKVCacheInferInstances
DescribeTairKVCacheInferInstances.summary: Queries the information of one or more Tair (Redis OSS-compatible) KVCache instances.

DescribeZones.title: DescribeZones
DescribeZones.summary: Queries the zones that support Tair (Redis OSS-compatible) in a specific region. To query the zones where Tair (Redis OSS-compatible) instances can be purchased, call the DescribeAvailableResource operation.

DestroyInstance.title: DestroyInstance
DestroyInstance.summary: Permanently destroys instances and their data backups in the recycle bin.

EnableAdditionalBandwidth.title: EnableAdditionalBandwidth
EnableAdditionalBandwidth.summary: Adjusts the bandwidth of a Tair (Redis OSS-compatible) instance. Only the pay-as-you-go billing method is supported for bandwidth adjustment. You need to specify the InstanceId, NodeId (optional), Bandwidth, and ChargeType parameters.

FlushExpireKeys.title: FlushExpireKeys
FlushExpireKeys.summary: Clears all expired keys in a Tair (Redis OSS-compatible) instance.

FlushInstance.title: FlushInstance
FlushInstance.summary: Clears the data of a Tair (Redis OSS-compatible) instance. The cleared data cannot be restored.

FlushInstanceForDB.title: FlushInstanceForDB
FlushInstanceForDB.summary: Cleans the data of specified databases in a Tair (Redis OSS-compatible) instance.

GrantAccountPrivilege.title: GrantAccountPrivilege
GrantAccountPrivilege.summary: Modifies the permissions of an account for a Tair (Redis OSS-compatible) instance.

InitializeKvstorePermission.title: InitializeKvstorePermission
InitializeKvstorePermission.summary: Assigns a service-linked role to Tair (Redis OSS-compatible).

ListTagResources.title: ListTagResources
ListTagResources.summary: Queries the relationships between Tair (Redis OSS-compatible) instances and tags.

LockDBInstanceWrite.title: LockDBInstanceWrite
LockDBInstanceWrite.summary: Locks an instance. After the instance is locked, you can only read data from the instance, but cannot write data to the instance.

MigrateToOtherZone.title: MigrateToOtherZone
MigrateToOtherZone.summary: Migrates a Tair (Redis OSS-compatible) instance to another zone in the same region.

ModifyAccountDescription.title: ModifyAccountDescription
ModifyAccountDescription.summary: Modifies the description of an account for a Tair (Redis OSS-compatible) instance.

ModifyAccountPassword.title: ModifyAccountPassword
ModifyAccountPassword.summary: Modifies the password of an account for a Tair (Redis OSS-compatible) instance.

ModifyActiveOperationTask.title: ModifyActiveOperationTask
ModifyActiveOperationTask.summary: Changes the scheduled switchover time of an O\&M task.

ModifyActiveOperationTasks.title: ModifyActiveOperationTasks
ModifyActiveOperationTasks.summary: Modifies the switching time of scheduled O\\\&M events for an instance.

ModifyAuditLogConfig.title: ModifyAuditLogConfig
ModifyAuditLogConfig.summary: Enables the audit log feature or modifies the audit log settings for a Tair (Redis OSS-compatible) instance.

ModifyBackupExpireTime.title: ModifyBackupExpireTime
ModifyBackupExpireTime.summary: Extends the expiration time of manual backup data.

ModifyBackupPolicy.title: ModifyBackupPolicy
ModifyBackupPolicy.summary: Modifies the automatic backup policy of a Tair (Redis OSS-compatible) instance.

ModifyDBInstanceAutoUpgrade.title: ModifyDBInstanceAutoUpgrade
ModifyDBInstanceAutoUpgrade.summary: Modifies the settings related to the automatic minor version update for an instance.

ModifyDBInstanceConnectionString.title: ModifyDBInstanceConnectionString
ModifyDBInstanceConnectionString.summary: Changes the endpoint or port number of a Tair (Redis OSS-compatible) instance.

ModifyDBInstanceMonitor.title: ModifyDBInstanceMonitor
ModifyDBInstanceMonitor.summary: Modifies the monitoring granularity of a Tair (Redis OSS-compatible) instance.

ModifyGlobalSecurityIPGroup.title: ModifyGlobalSecurityIPGroup
ModifyGlobalSecurityIPGroup.summary: Modifies a global IP whitelist template.

ModifyGlobalSecurityIPGroupName.title: ModifyGlobalSecurityIPGroupName
ModifyGlobalSecurityIPGroupName.summary: Modifies the name of a global IP whitelist template.

ModifyGlobalSecurityIPGroupRelation.title: ModifyGlobalSecurityIPGroupRelation
ModifyGlobalSecurityIPGroupRelation.summary: Adds a specified instance to a specified IP whitelist template.

ModifyInstanceAttribute.title: ModifyInstanceAttribute
ModifyInstanceAttribute.summary: Modifies the specific information of a Tair (Redis OSS-compatible) instance, such as the password and the name.

ModifyInstanceAutoRenewalAttribute.title: ModifyInstanceAutoRenewalAttribute
ModifyInstanceAutoRenewalAttribute.summary: Enables or disables auto-renewal for a Tair (Redis OSS-compatible) instance.

ModifyInstanceBandwidth.title: ModifyInstanceBandwidth
ModifyInstanceBandwidth.summary: Sets the intended bandwidth value of a Tair (Redis OSS-compatible) instance.

ModifyInstanceConfig.title: ModifyInstanceConfig
ModifyInstanceConfig.summary: Modifies the parameter settings of a Tair (Redis OSS-compatible) instance.

ModifyInstanceMaintainTime.title: ModifyInstanceMaintainTime
ModifyInstanceMaintainTime.summary: Modifies the maintenance window of a Tair (Redis OSS-compatible) instance. Alibaba Cloud maintains Tair (Redis OSS-compatible) instances during the specified maintenance window.

ModifyInstanceMajorVersion.title: ModifyInstanceMajorVersion
ModifyInstanceMajorVersion.summary: Upgrades the major version of a Tair (Redis OSS-compatible) instance.

ModifyInstanceMinorVersion.title: ModifyInstanceMinorVersion
ModifyInstanceMinorVersion.summary: Updates the minor version of a Tair (Redis OSS-compatible) instance.

ModifyInstanceNetExpireTime.title: ModifyInstanceNetExpireTime
ModifyInstanceNetExpireTime.summary: Extends the retention period of the classic network endpoint of a Tair (Redis OSS-compatible) instance. You can call this operation after you change the network type of the Tair (Redis OSS-compatible) instance from classic network to Virtual Private Cloud (VPC) with the classic network endpoint retained.

ModifyInstanceParameter.title: ModifyInstanceParameter
ModifyInstanceParameter.summary: Applies a parameter template to specific instances. This indicates that the parameter values in the template take effect on the instances. After you modify a parameter template, you must reapply it to specific instances for the new parameter values to take effect on the instances.

ModifyInstanceSSL.title: ModifyInstanceSSL
ModifyInstanceSSL.summary: Enables Transport Layer Security (TLS) for a Tair (Redis OSS-compatible) instance.

ModifyInstanceSpec.title: ModifyInstanceSpec
ModifyInstanceSpec.summary: Changes the configurations of a Tair (Redis OSS-compatible) instance.

ModifyInstanceTDE.title: ModifyInstanceTDE
ModifyInstanceTDE.summary: Enables transparent data encryption (TDE) for a Tair (Redis OSS-compatible) instance. You can use existing custom keys.

ModifyInstanceVpcAuthMode.title: ModifyInstanceVpcAuthMode
ModifyInstanceVpcAuthMode.summary: Enables or disables password-free access for a Tair (Redis OSS-compatible) instance. This way, you can connect to a database in a convenient and secure manner.

ModifyIntranetAttribute.title: ModifyIntranetAttribute
ModifyIntranetAttribute.summary: Temporarily adjusts the internal bandwidth of a Tair (Redis OSS-compatible) instance that is deployed in a dedicated cluster.

ModifyParameterGroup.title: ModifyParameterGroup
ModifyParameterGroup.summary: Modifies the settings of a parameter template.

ModifyResourceGroup.title: ModifyResourceGroup
ModifyResourceGroup.summary: Modifies the resource group to which a Tair (Redis OSS-compatible) instance belongs.

ModifySecurityGroupConfiguration.title: ModifySecurityGroupConfiguration
ModifySecurityGroupConfiguration.summary: Resets the security groups that are added to the whitelists of a Tair (Redis OSS-compatible) instance.

ModifySecurityIps.title: ModifySecurityIps
ModifySecurityIps.summary: Configures an IP address whitelist for a Tair (Redis OSS-compatible) instance.

ModifyTaskInfo.title: ModifyTaskInfo
ModifyTaskInfo.summary: Modifies the task information, such as the task execution time.

RebootProxy.title: RebootProxy
RebootProxy.summary: Restarts the proxy node of a running Tair (Redis OSS-compatible) instance.

ReleaseDirectConnection.title: ReleaseDirectConnection
ReleaseDirectConnection.summary: Releases the private endpoint of a Tair (Redis OSS-compatible) cluster instance.

ReleaseInstancePublicConnection.title: ReleaseInstancePublicConnection
ReleaseInstancePublicConnection.summary: Releases the public endpoint of a Tair (Redis OSS-compatible) instance.

RemoveSubInstance.title: RemoveSubInstance
RemoveSubInstance.summary: Removes a child instance from a distributed instance.

RenewAdditionalBandwidth.title: RenewAdditionalBandwidth
RenewAdditionalBandwidth.summary: This operation is not recommended now. The billing method for bandwidth of a Tair (Redis OSS-compatible) instance is changed to pay-as-you-go.

RenewInstance.title: RenewInstance
RenewInstance.summary: Renews a Tair (Redis OSS-compatible) subscription instance.

ResetAccountPassword.title: ResetAccountPassword
ResetAccountPassword.summary: Resets the password of an account for a Tair (Redis OSS-compatible) instance.

RestartInstance.title: RestartInstance
RestartInstance.summary: Restarts a running Tair (Redis OSS-compatible) instance.

RestoreInstance.title: RestoreInstance
RestoreInstance.summary: Restores the data in a backup file to a specified Tair (Redis OSS-compatible) instance.

SwitchInstanceHA.title: SwitchInstanceHA
SwitchInstanceHA.summary: Performs a master-replica switchover to switch node roles. This operation is applicable to disaster recovery drills and nearby access to applications that are deployed across zones.

SwitchInstanceProxy.title: SwitchInstanceProxy
SwitchInstanceProxy.summary: Enables or disables the proxy mode for a Tair (Redis OSS-compatible) cluster instance in a dedicated cluster.

SwitchInstanceZoneFailOver.title: SwitchInstanceZoneFailOver
SwitchInstanceZoneFailOver.summary: Switches an instance from the current zone to the specified zone in the event of a fault.

SwitchNetwork.title: SwitchNetwork
SwitchNetwork.summary: Changes the VPC or vSwitch of a Tair (Redis OSS-compatible) instance. If the instance is deployed in the classic network, the network type of the instance is changed from the classic network to VPC.

SyncDtsStatus.title: SyncDtsStatus
SyncDtsStatus.summary: Disables configuration changes for a Tair (Redis OSS-compatible) instance before you use Data Transmission Service (DTS) to migrate or synchronize data of the instance. This prevents migration and synchronization task failures due to configuration changes.

TagResources.title: TagResources
TagResources.summary: Adds tags to Tair (Redis OSS-compatible) instances.

TransformInstanceChargeType.title: TransformInstanceChargeType
TransformInstanceChargeType.summary: Changes the billing method of a Tair (Redis OSS-compatible) instance from subscription to pay-as-you-go or from pay-as-you-go to subscription.

TransformToEcs.title: TransformToEcs
TransformToEcs.summary: Converts an instance use local disks to a cloud-native instance.

TransformToPrePaid.title: TransformToPrePaid
TransformToPrePaid.summary: Changes a pay-as-you-go Tair (Redis OSS-compatible) instance to a subscription instance.

UnlockDBInstanceWrite.title: UnlockDBInstanceWrite
UnlockDBInstanceWrite.summary: Unlocks a write-locked instance. After the instance is unlocked, you can read and write data to and from the instance.

UntagResources.title: UntagResources
UntagResources.summary: Removes tags from Tair (Redis OSS-compatible) instances.

UpgradeProxy.title: UpgradeProxy
UpgradeProxy.summary: Updates the proxy node of a cluster instance to the latest version.
